history.proof: intros P dec c. induction c. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto depth: 3.

original: intros P dec c. induction c. - right. intros d Hd. inversion Hd. - destruct (dec c) as [Hc|Hc]. + left. intros d Hd. apply Nat.lt_succ_r in Hd. destruct (Nat.eq_dec d c). * subst. contradiction Hc. apply Hd. * apply IHc. apply Hd. + right. exists c. split. * apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. * apply Hc.
